title: Find If Path Exists in Graph
statement: Given an undirected graph with V vertices and E edges, and two vertices SOURCE and DESTINATION, determine if there is a valid path from SOURCE to DESTINATION.
input_format:
First line contains V, E, SOURCE, and DESTINATION.
Next E lines contain two integers U and V representing an edge.
output_format: Print 'YES' if a path exists, otherwise 'NO'.
